website_summaries.verdict: This gentle formula exfoliates and hydrates skin at a surprisingly low cost for how much you get.
pros: This lotion gently exfoliates skin while also moisturizing it to keep skin from drying out further
Doesn't leave your skin feeling sticky or greasy
cons: Users have complained about the product's natural medicinal smell

customer_reviews.title: Fake!!! Do NOT buy!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought this for years. As soon as I received it I immediately knew something wasn’t quite right. It smelled sour and rancid. I compared the back of the bottle to that of a store bought bottle. Completely different ingedients and a different distributor. This is a fake item.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Swanson

customer_reviews.title: This is not a genuine product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lotion online as a backup since my normal store sometimes doesn’t have it. I just finished the bottle I bought in store and tried this one. Immediately I noticed the consistency, and then the smell hit me. Normal amlactin does smell, but it is more on the chemical ammonia side. This smelled completely sour and like it had gone bad. The color was darker than the real bottle too. I had someone else smell the bottle I got from the store vs this one and they also knew they were not the same. Do not buy!
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Smells bad and didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: My dermatologist recommended this lotion to treat the small red bumps on the back of my arms. I used it religiously for the entire summer, once in the morning and once at night, only to have no improvement. I could have dealt with the chemical smell and greasy feel if I had seen any progression. Buy yourself lotion that smells pretty or makes your skin feel nice, Amlactin will do neither. I don’t recommend this lotion.
customer_reviews.author: KatieTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: It’s gross
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this for two days and have seen improvement already in my skin, especially the pesky little bumps on my arms and legs, so that’s why I gave it two stars. The downside is that it smells SO strongly like ranch dressing! The bottle says it is fragrance free but there’s a strong smell when you apply it and it smells exactly like ranch! It can be covered up with some perfume or cologne but everyone I have asked says it smells like a bottle of Hidden Valley dressing, so that’s pretty disappointing and gross.
customer_reviews.author: Giulia Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Great for KP, makes skin super soft
customer_reviews.text: Exfoliation in the shower, then using this right after the shower and applied consistently before bed other days took care of 80% of the KP on my legs. On top of looking better, my skin feels super soft. The smell is fine to me, it's not great but inoffensive - it's faint and doesn't stick around once the lotion is absorbed.
customer_reviews.author: K. Durivage

customer_reviews.title: Not the real thing
customer_reviews.text: This is not the real amlactin. It hasn’t a totally different consistency and is a little oily and smells completely different. Unfortunately I ordered it in advance of running out of my other bottles and now it’s too late to return it. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Ridiculous!!
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed. I’ve been using this product for a couple of years now at my doctors direction because my skin is so sensitive. I make sure I stay stocked up because it’s the only thing that works for me. Well I just opened the double pack that I purchased late last year only to find it has a scent and the scent is HORRIBLE, it’s a deep tan color and not the white that it normally is and it certainly doesn’t work. Too bad for me because I can’t even get my money back
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda Torrance

customer_reviews.title: FAKE Amlactin
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT real Amlactin lotion! I’ve used Amlactin for years and the minute I put this on, I knew it wasn’t the real stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Tasha Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Amlactin  it’s self is great but this particular bottle is
customer_reviews.text: I have used AmLactin for years and love it so much I swear by it! But this product for some reason the lotion color is different than others it’s not white it’s a yellowish and it smells terrible does not work either
customer_reviews.author: Saresa Whitwer

customer_reviews.title: Even better than prescription creams for rough patches!
customer_reviews.text: As anyone over 50 can tell you, dry rough patches are an increasing annoyance. Another perk of our "golden years"! My husband's dermatologist recommended this for a birthmark on his temple that started thickening to the point that it looked like it would peel. He was told it would leave a bigger scar to remove it, this unscented lotion made a significant difference the first time he used it. We were so impressed, I ordered some for my brother. Works better than any non-prescription product he tried, it is definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey C

customer_reviews.title: This is fake.
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have read the reviews first but didn't even think too. I didn't realize anyone would make a fake Amlactin. If you frequently use Amlactin, you know this is a fake from the moment you put it on. It really makes me lose trust in Amazon knowing they're still allowing this to be sold.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Goodson

customer_reviews.title: Works wonders.
customer_reviews.text: I use this for embarrassing pimples on my butt and bumps on the back of my thighs. I wish i took a picture to show the difference. It’s extremely moisturizing and i maybe have 2-3 small pimples left that are barely pimples anymore. I try to use it twice a day... straight out of the shower and before bed. The smell sucks but i have learned to ignore it. I also have bad eczema which led to extremely dry feet and this has helped tremendously. Only dislike is i saw a lot of people received theirs open and spilled and mine came the same way.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle S

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: The 1st or 2nd ingredient was mineral oil. Quite pricey for a mineral oil product. Mineral oil, Petroleum, Shea Butter are all topicals and sit on the top skin. I have extremely dry skin so I need a product like glycerin and soaks into the skin. This product simply doesn't work for me. Gave it to a co-worker.
customer_reviews.author: Kym

customer_reviews.title: Ketosis Pilarios Approved
customer_reviews.text: If you suffer from Ketosis Pilarios you need this product! Ive been using this product for a week now and I have noticed a huge difference. The redness that was associated with the Ketosis Pilarios has gone away and all the bumps are pretty much gone, I would say 98% are gone. My arms feel so much smoother. I will admit I only use it once a day (at night), but I'm trying to get better at using it twice a day. The lotion is a little thin and does have a slight smell.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Askew (Jennifer's Life)

customer_reviews.title: Fake
customer_reviews.text: Fake! Comes open in the box with no wrapper. I have used amlacin for years and as soon as I saw the broken bottle and the cream coming out of it I knew it was real. Amlactin is much thinner, white and has a very unique smell. Do not buy from these people
customer_reviews.author: amy hodge

customer_reviews.title: Great for bumpy skin
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lotion specifically because of my chicken skin (bumps on my upper arms and thighs). I’ve been using it on my upper arms 1-2x each day for about three weeks now and I definitely feel a difference. The bumps aren’t gone, but my arms feel less rough - almost like the bumps themselves are smaller. If you’re looking for a light weight lotion this isn’t for you. It’s heavy and thick. I use it on my chicken skin and then use a lighter lotion on the rest of my body, because I hate the feel of heavy lotion. If you have chicken skin like me, or are in need of some deep moisturizing, I would definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Michele c.

customer_reviews.title: Poor packaging/shipping
customer_reviews.text: I do like this lotion. I use it on a daily basis....helps alot! With my "chicken skin" There is a very minimal lotion scent, it is NOT greasy. However the packaging of this order did not work out so well, as you can see in the photos.....it seems the lid was not tightly attached and I opened the box to a mess!
customer_reviews.author: Talia Weston

customer_reviews.title: Dry skin savior
customer_reviews.text: Both my stepdaughter and I have super dry skin. She has bumps on her arms on top of it. The lactic acid in this lotion helps smooth and exfoliate while moisturizing. It's a nice light formula so even people without dry skin could benefit from it, and the light exfoliating is especially helpful as you age and your natural skin cell turnover slows down to keep skin looking fresh. I'd be careful around sensitive areas or cuts because it does sting a bit but otherwise it's a real life saver.
customer_reviews.author: Rory Gephart Leahy

customer_reviews.title: My skin looks and feels healthy!
customer_reviews.text: I constantly have dry patches on my nose and even aquaphor doesn’t help. I started using this because my dermatologist recommended it for bumpy skin on my body. It definitely stings when you apply it on your bumpy skin but it goes away quickly. For once, my nose is never dry or flaky! I use it at least once a day on my face and body. I’ve DEFINITELY noticed my skin has gotten softer all around. Does not make my face break out either. I can definitely tell that my skin is healthier. The hydration actually lasts too. I love this lotion!
customer_reviews.author: kttttmmmm

customer_reviews.title: AmLactin
customer_reviews.text: Very strong smelling AHA lotion. It does take some getting use to because of the strong smell. I usually mix it with a little regular lotion to cut the smell. I forgot my aha moisturizer on a trip and had the lotion with me. Used a little on a rough patch on my face and it worked well, no more rough patch.
customer_reviews.author: ButterflyG

customer_reviews.title: No scent. Fantastic softness
customer_reviews.text: See pic for lactic acid percentage and rank in ingredients line. This is exactly what my winter skin needed. Honestly, I’m going to use this year round since soft skin isn’t seasonal!! Thank you to you tuber Graceful Beauty for turning me into this!
customer_reviews.author: BinaryCode

customer_reviews.title: Urine scented lotion?
customer_reviews.text: It smells SO bad. I hate it. I don't care if it cures dry skin... I don't want to smell like piss.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew H. Bardwell

customer_reviews.title: Not sure I can get over the smell
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only had this for a week so I can’t say yet if it will really be effective but I can say the smell is awful. It is unscented and smells horrible. I’ve never had a lotion smell this bad ever. Honestly I don’t know if I will be able to keep using it because of this and I’m looking for an alternative.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Not sure the cost, or smell, is worth it
customer_reviews.text: It smells like box dye. Ammonium lactate? Is that a good thing? I liked that this is fragrance free, but that smell is terrible. It works decent enough. I'm not sure the cost is completely justified though. I've used it 3 times on my entire body and a bit more on my hands. The bottle is a third gone already. I've used much cheaper brands that work just as well. Alba botanica very emolient maximum is one of them.
customer_reviews.author: Heatherlynn

customer_reviews.title: works great for exfoliating
customer_reviews.text: Really does work great for exfoliating the back of your arms where some people get a little bumpy! Dont go in the sun after use, you will definitely burn! Use sunscreen!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Helped My Eczema
customer_reviews.text: Turned my dry, flakey, cracked, bleeding hands soft and mostly pain free. Not a cure, but a huge improvement in comfort and appearance. I've recommended it to several people and will continue to do so. I'm a very happy customer.

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works
customer_reviews.text: Great for super dry skin, cracked skin, keratosis pilaris, etc. Do not use after shaving legs, you will sting yourself. Has a pungent ammonia-type smell that wears off quickly. Worth the smell & the money IF your dry skin is a serious issue such as heat radiator-related dryness. The cream is even stronger than the lotion but they both work. I cannot recommend the Rapid Relief formula, it seemed less effective to me.
customer_reviews.author: AK-47

customer_reviews.title: Now I have 2 smooth feet
customer_reviews.text: I love how smooth my feet are after using this! It's a little pricey for a small bottle but a little goes a long way. There is a slight smell but it isn't fragrant so after I rub it in there's nothing lingering. The formula is a bit buttery so it sits on the skin but rub a little longer and it'll soak in. I'm pretty sure it's supposed to be thick to be healing so use at night is my recommendation.
customer_reviews.author: Cannotbfound

customer_reviews.title: Brand new?
customer_reviews.text: This bottle of lotion arrived today... It clearly isn't full (14.1 oz), after reading other reviews I'm a concern that it might be a fake. It just doesn't seem right beware!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff! Worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: I get horrible razor burn and ingrown hairs, so the lady that waxed me suggested I get this. It is so amazing! Just after a couple days there was a very noticeable difference. I also have Keratosis Polaris on my arms and this has helped them look better. I don’t use it on my arms as much just because I forget but I’m sure if I used it regularly it would work amazingly. The smell is a little weird but it’s not super powerful or anything. It also absorbs super quickly, so there’s no greasy or oily residue left behind.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: My skin is breaking out :(
customer_reviews.text: I was super pumped about this product because it is a cheap way to buy amlactin, which is known for diminishing the look of PK. Unfortunately, the product stings when I put it on my skin, and leaves my skin red and aggravated for a few hours. Here's the kicker though; it leaves your skin even more dry than if you never used any lotion at all and makes your PK MORE pronounced. I strongly advise anyone looking into this product not to purchase it.
customer_reviews.author: nikki

customer_reviews.title: Softens rough & dry skin within a few days use!
customer_reviews.text: This product works great for dry skin! I have been using it nightly on my mother-in-law’s feet and it definitely softened her heals and toes. It doesn’t really have a scent — not that I could tell —which is a plus. I would recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Charlene H

customer_reviews.title: Resolved my “chicken skin” patch promptly! Medical dx skin issues healed
customer_reviews.text: Depends on your skin issue. I have “chicken skin”, scars, etc this is the 1 thing to treat and address it as stated to me by my dermatologist. The cost? Know you can get a generic, 12% Lactin lotion to do the same at half the cost. The 1 I have tried was almost as good. I enjoy this and the blue the amlactin lotion texture. There is a slight difference. I have eczema, old scares, I use this also on my face and keeps my skin hydrated. Love this.
customer_reviews.author: JMATX

customer_reviews.title: Work incredibly well, no fragrance
customer_reviews.text: This is a great way to try out these products without committing to whole bottles. I was amazed at how quickly the Rapid Relief lotion and the Smoothing Cream worked, compared to every other product I have tried. I have used them successfully on small spots of eczema, calloused and cracked feet, and large stretches of lower leg that don't get as much care and exfoliation as the parts I can reach more easily. Also, I have very bad reactions to scents, and these products are blessedly fragrance free.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Frankel

customer_reviews.title: Good for Keratosis pilaris and it does smooth your skin
customer_reviews.text: Having Keratosis Polaris on my arms and legs for long and it really bothers me. The Dermitology suggest me to use this lotion and been applied it to my whole body for few years. It does work! Your skin might get irritated when first time applies it. However, after a weeks, you will feel better. Continually using it helps to improve your skin. I wish amazon price could be more reasonable cuz I find Costco has better price and periodically Costco even has discount too.
customer_reviews.author: T. Hsu

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for my sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to try this product because it worked for so many people! It didn’t work for me though, after a week of using I developed an eczema rash because of the acid in this lotion. I believe this will work for some people but it didn’t for me! Kind of disappointed I dropped $20 on this :/
customer_reviews.author: Sarah C

customer_reviews.title: Can it be made lightly scented?!
customer_reviews.text: Do not care for the smell at all. It's not awful and pungent, just unpleasant. Still I'll do it twice a day and see how it does. It feel creamy and soaks in well.
customer_reviews.author: Fumi

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: I got this for the keratosis pilaris (chicken skin) on my arms and it really hasn't helped much. I've heard so many people recommend this for that exact condition but it hasn't done anything for me. The smell isn't great and it's a little sticky until it dries. This might work great for other skin conditions and people but just has not lived up to the hype and I'm not thrilled that I spent so much money to find out it didn't work.
customer_reviews.author: JanetteTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Works for my KP
customer_reviews.text: This lotion has done a great job of keeping my keratosis pilaris at bay. It stings a little if you have a blemish that's open, but that just tells me it's working. I use it mostly on my forearms where my KP flares up.
customer_reviews.author: jeslick

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I have always had bumps on my arms, to get rid of them I exfoliate with the Biore soap exfoliant bars (HIGHLY recommend) and then I apply Amlactin, and I’m SO happy with the results. My arms are SO soft and smooth for the first time it seems. Also, I tried putting it on my legs too but it burned so just beware it may not be best for the parts of your body that you shave.
customer_reviews.author: Jill B.

customer_reviews.title: Potentially tampered with
customer_reviews.text: I've used Amlactin for years and something about the smell and texture of the lotion from this last order seems off. It also doesn't cause that familiar, slight sting when applying directly after a shower. Additionally, about a quarter of the bottle was missing upon arrival. Seems sketchy.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa M.

customer_reviews.title: Not an authentic Amlactin product
customer_reviews.text: The product came damaged with lotion leaking all over the cap. What made is worse is it was also rancid. My skin type is not the one that is allergic to products but this started slightly burning my skin when I applied it. Thanks to Amazon - they refunded me immediately when I reported this. I am not going to buy this here again and going to see my dermatologist instead for product recommendation.
customer_reviews.author: SN

customer_reviews.title: Damaged packaging
customer_reviews.text: The product is fine. I've purchased it many times at COSTCO. Because I can't drive all the time, I decided to order from Amazon. Big mistake. The package came damaged. The cream had gotten squeezed out of the bottle. Won't order through Amazon any more.
customer_reviews.author: Original Settler

customer_reviews.title: Great for eczema!!
customer_reviews.text: ok so I wanted to try something to start fading my dark spots from eczema and it’s doing such a great job!! I saw some reviews saying this is fake but I went to Walmart to try it out, the smell and consistency is the same (:
customer_reviews.author: johanna

customer_reviews.title: smells terrible but works well
customer_reviews.text: Yes there is a pretty strong ammonia odor from this product. This aspect lessens when it dries but I definitely feel self-conscious that I smell like cat pee after putting it on. However, I get folliculitis on my legs really easily and this is the only thing I have found that makes a big difference when used several times a week. I don't think I would buy it if I were using it for an upper body part given the bad odor it leaves on you.
customer_reviews.author: Rainbow Productions

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great results
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing. I’ve had trouble with limited body acne for over 20 years; tried several dermatologists, many OTC products, and spent a lot of time and money with no results. I found this lotion and it zapped it away almost overnight. It also helped with the eczema I had on my elbow. It doesn’t have a smell, it isn’t greasy, and it lasts for a very long time. Definitely worth trying!
customer_reviews.author: LeAna S. McNemar

customer_reviews.title: Received a broken bottle
customer_reviews.text: The product is okay. But I received a broken bottle. Almost a quarter of it was empty when I received.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best body lotion I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: Dermatologist recommended this lotion and I've been using this product for three years now. At age 67 I've found my skin is clearer and softer with the use of AmLactin. I purchased this size for travel and have a larger size for home use. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia L. Sutton

customer_reviews.title: Smells horrible! :(
customer_reviews.text: 7/30/2020 - I saw the overall rating of the product as high so I neglected to read the comments in full before I purchased this item. That was a huge mistake, there were tons of warnings about the smell. The scent is quite horrible, really. The rancid/ sour smell off puts all the 'pros' of this item. However, I've only used it once - tonight. I'll use it a few more times and see if my skin is softer and smoother after a few uses. I had to use bath and body works on top of it to give it a better smell. Tomorrow I'll try adding essential oils instead. Stay tuned...
customer_reviews.author: Melissa M.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: While I don’t care for the smell of the lotion- it smells very "clinical"- this lotion is magic! It definitely gets rid of dry, flakey skin way better than anything I've ever tried, which says a lot! Bumpy skin is also gone and I am nice and smooth! The smell does not linger, so really its not terrible. I also use this on my face.
customer_reviews.author: MomOfBoys2

customer_reviews.title: Chicken-bumps be gone!
customer_reviews.text: So I'm using this for a skin condition. and it works to get rid of the chicken bumps; however, there's a lot of lactic acid so you'll feel it burn your skin, especially if you have sensitive skin. I had to stop using it for a bit because I started getting a rash, but I'm sure that if I had kept using it, my bumps would've disappeared. Even though I stopped using it for a bit, I see some parts of my arm that are a lot better.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: BUY if you have butt “pimples” and rough spots on your arms
customer_reviews.text: BUY if you have butt “pimples” and rough spots on your arms. It will keep the rate clear and smooth. I notice i have way less breakout. When i stop using it my pimples and bumps come back. Have been using it for 5 years now. Dont travel without it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fake item do not buy. If it smells bad its fake
customer_reviews.text: This is a counterfeit item and a bad one . Cant believe amazon hasn't stopped whoever is selling this item. The sent on this lotion is horrible smells toxic chemicals. The bottle looks like cheap plastic and the labels and colors are washed out which just ads to the fakeness of this item. Do not buy .
customer_reviews.author: 7r432000

customer_reviews.title: Heads up
customer_reviews.text: I have used Amlactin for several years now. It is a great product for flaky dry skin. I usually buy this at the pharmacy but since we are in isolation I purchased it on Amazon. Unfortunately the vendor left out 1/4 of the product from the bottle. Now I am concerned that the product itself may not be genuine.
customer_reviews.author: SMS

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for ketosis pilaris, but be careful in the sun
customer_reviews.text: This lotion totally erased my ketosis pilaris. It’s amazing, and without having to go to a derm. It smells a little weird going on, but it fades super fast and you can layer whatever scent on top of it. I just bought more. That said, listen to the warning on the bottle about sun exposure. I totally forgot about it, and spent two hours outside painting a fence - got monster sunburn. I do not ever burn or turn red, so this is a first for me. As long as you remember sunblock (like I will be sure to do next time!) you’ll be fine. Skin is silky smooth!
customer_reviews.author: helena minerva

customer_reviews.title: Fades acne scars!!!
customer_reviews.text: I recently developed acne on my bum and had scars to prove it. While desperately trying to find solutions and do research, I came across this product! This product faded my scars and healed recovering acne within 3 days! The smell is not my favorite, but it's doing my skin a deed. It contains lactic acid which is a mild chemical exfoliant. This product is so affordable and moisturizing!!! I highly recommend to anyone who suffers from body acne :).
customer_reviews.author: ally

customer_reviews.title: I'm liking the results.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product on the recommendations of a friend and a dermatologist. I have been using it after showers for about 2 weeks now and like the results, smoother more even appearance on my legs and arms. It does have a weird smell when first applied and no fragrance. The smell goes away pretty quickly. It takes a few minutes to fully sink into the skin but does not leave a greasy feel. I recommend this lotion and plan to repurchase once I run out.
customer_reviews.author: Karen S.

customer_reviews.title: Works Quickly
customer_reviews.text: I used to use this years ago because my dermatologist suggested it and don't remember why I stopped using it. I was having issues with major dryness on my lower leg and remembered this product. Within a few days my skin was smooth and supple again. It worked so quickly. Just make sure to get a good sunscreen since you will be sun sensitive.
customer_reviews.author: Cmhoddy

customer_reviews.title: 3 pack?
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these small size products to use as a pre-treatment before PDT treatment at my dermatolgist . I had to cancel appointment so never used product. There were supose to be three bottles in the pack, I only recently opened the box and the smoothing lotion was not included. They are a perfect travel size if that is why you would purchase them.
customer_reviews.author: bridges

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, but worth it for Karatosis Pilaris & other dry skin conditions.
customer_reviews.text: The best product I've found for my Karatosis Pilaris. Very moisturizing. I use after showering on damp skin, find it absorbs well without leaving skin feeling sticky (but it takes a few minutes). It doesn't smell nice, but the odor isn't strong & disipates quickly. I much prefer it to "scented" lotions. My only real complaint is that it's so expensive & it's impossible to get all the lotion out of the bottles. Wish they packaged it so there was less waste. Price on Amazon generally isn't great, but the double pack (using Prime) offers some savings.
customer_reviews.author: K Squared

customer_reviews.title: Works WONDERS for keratosis pilaris!
customer_reviews.text: I struggle with stubborn KP (keratosis pilaris) on my chest and back, somewhere that nearly no one else has it. When I shower,I scrub my chest with an exfoliating towel (mine is from Earth Therapeutics) using Biore Acne Charcoal Scrub. That helps extremely with texture but leave the appearance of bumps completely. I follow up with this lotion, and it is nearly diminished! At night as well as on days I don't shower, I use Stridex Maximum Strength wipes instead, which also have helped a buttload :)
customer_reviews.author: Elijah Walker

customer_reviews.title: Great for scaly skin and preventing ingrown hairs
customer_reviews.text: This stuff really helps with preventing ingrown hairs and scaly skin! It does smell a little weird, but if you wash your hands after you put it on, you won't notice.
customer_reviews.author: Ash Williams

customer_reviews.title: Miracle worker!
customer_reviews.text: Smells awful but it’s a miracle lotion! I bought it for my daughter by recommendation from her pediatrician for her dry skin and ended up using it on my own hands as well. My hands were so dry and cracked that this stuff burned like heck the first time I used it. But every time after that, my hands healed more and more each day. I couldn’t believe it! No lotion I’ve ever tried (my hands crack every winter) has ever been able to do that.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great for dry skin
customer_reviews.text: I really like this lotion and it works great on my super dry skin. NOTE: 12% Lactic Acid will give sensitive areas a quick sensation when applying the lotion.
customer_reviews.author: hollywood123

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very thin and watery. Very pricey yet found it to be no better than other less expensive lotions so I don't consider it a good value. It's supposed to be scent free however it smells terrible. I would highly recommend the company give it a pleasant scent just to cover up the smell. Very disappointing. I won't be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Super moisturizer. It works as said.
customer_reviews.text: I love how Amlactin makes my skin look. Plumped and even makes my skin fairer. My God! I love Amlactin. It was recently I noticed it was not for facial use. Was using it on my face at night only and I dont think i can stop because its also for my face.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I feel like this lotion stinks, as in it smells really bad to me, but the smell does we're off and it definitely works as it says it does. if you want a product that will get rid of acne or keratosis pilaris on your arms or legs then you are purchasing the right product and it is actually an expensive for what you are getting in return!
customer_reviews.author: Angie Buys Online

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My skin has never felt better. It's not oily or heavy and great for winter weather - the only reason this does not get 5 stars is the "scent." It's indecent. I don't know what you do about that except use it after your shower in the evening and use a nice fragrance after your shower in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: GLD

customer_reviews.title: I’m half and half on this product
customer_reviews.text: The lotion doesn’t smell very good, It’s not a bad scent it almost smells like nothing. I used it after getting out of the shower and shaving and it did cause my legs to kind of burn a little. But it does moisturize well. Perhaps it’s just the ingredients serving their purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Dry, cracked, itchy skin relief
customer_reviews.text: You can't beat the relief AmLactin gives you for dry, itchy, and cracked skin. My dermatologist recommended this to me many years ago and I haven't looked back. It's by far the best product I've ever used for dry skin. You can't beat the price of it from Amazon either.
customer_reviews.author: poorme 4

customer_reviews.title: Best lotion ever!
customer_reviews.text: My mother has very dry, thin skin. Her doctor recommended this brand in the Daily Lotion. I have some dry skin on legs and feet and nothing has really worked very well. I got the travel to try for myself. First tried the instant repair. It was amazing! I saw instant results. Have switched to the daily to keep them moisturized. Works better than any other lotion I've tried. Very sheer, absorbs fast. Not really much scent at all. If you are sensitive to fragrance, this won't be an issue. LOVE THIS PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.author: Noelle

customer_reviews.title: Not completely scent free but SUPER moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for people with super dry skin or other conditions like Keratosis pilaris. The smell is not my favorite but it’s pretty neutral. For how moisturizing this product is the smell is a non-issue though, my new favorite weapon for dry cold winters.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My dermatologist recommended this and I'm never going back
customer_reviews.text: I first started using this over a year ago when my dermatologist recommended it and I have no regrets. I used to get small bumps on my arms like little white heads (keratosis pilaris) and I didn't know what to do about them. My dermatologist recommended this and my bumps have virtually disappeared. You just have to make sure you use it consistently or else it doesn't work. Also started to use this for small bumps after shaving and it works really well for that too.
customer_reviews.author: Katherin Acosta

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper than going to a dermatologist
customer_reviews.text: Got rid of my skin tags within a week. The product dried them out. I use this solely at night. For me personally after a few consecutive uses my skin started to sting when i would apply this. Nothing I couldn't stand and of course the results made the sting worth it. I was terrified of having a dermatologist burn or cut them off. This is a better and very affordable alternative. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa M.

customer_reviews.title: Good softner!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this lotion. Takes a little longer to absorb completely, but it does.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rotten
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this mosturiser for years now because my doctor recommended it for dry skin. But this bottle was rotten...smelled really bad...cant use it. I'm not sur they'll take it back. I just opened it, but had it since this pandemic started.
customer_reviews.author: Vera

customer_reviews.title: Smells different than same product purchased at pharmacy.
customer_reviews.text: I have use this product that I purchased at the pharmacy in the past. The one shipped to me from Amazon smells funny. Everything else is exactly the same except for the scent. It is a good value though. This lotion is much more expensive through a retail store.
customer_reviews.author: R. Knutson

customer_reviews.title: Don’t let the smell catch you off guard, it works!
customer_reviews.text: My son has very dry skin, not even baby oil on moist skin works. This product definitely holds in moisture, the consistency is runny, less is more. The only issue is the smell, it’s not what you’d expect in a lotion. I don’t want to say it stinks but there’s definitely a medicine/ointment smell to it. The smell dissipates after awhile but initially, it’s not something you’d cuddle up to.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Greasy, Runny and Putrid Smell
customer_reviews.text: The advertisement said it was moisturizing, and that contained rich emollients. In truth it was runny, stinky and downright nasty! Between the feel of greasiness and the putrid smell, I had it washed off in record time. TERRIBLE product!
customer_reviews.author: Mary R.K.

customer_reviews.title: Counterfeit product. Smells wrong, texture wrong, no sting.
customer_reviews.text: Counterfeit product. Smells different. Texture different. And when I went over a little cut it didn’t sting like drug store bought ( because of the lactic acid).
customer_reviews.author: readsalot

customer_reviews.title: moisturizing properties
customer_reviews.text: My dermatologist recommended it and I have used it twice as I just got it. First, I was not able to get the pump to work and finally had to use pliers to hold the grey band tight and then I could release the pump. Then I happened to be in the light and noticed that it was not filled to the top. There was 1 1/2 inches of space where the lotion should have been. It started just above and A of Amlactin. I prefer scent free and this was minimal. I will not return this because of the mess and will purchase again. Maybe I'll get lucky with a better pump and more product in the container.
customer_reviews.author: Teotribe

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with lid off
customer_reviews.text: The inside of the package was a mess of lotion. And the dispensing cap cannot be opened, so this lotion needs to be put into another container to use. I will not order this again.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Darsie Storm

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, but not good for the money
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended by my dermatologist, but I don’t care for it very much. It does not particularly moisturize very well and it doesn’t smell very good, it’s not terrible, but not good. It is also kind of pricey. I won’t be buying it again.
customer_reviews.author: JulieN

customer_reviews.title: Look no further -awesome product for dryskin. However...
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping. Arrived as scheduled. Product is awesome for dry skin suffers like me. Although, was a bit surprised & disappointed for what I thought was a "more bang for my buck" purchase per se - Bummer the twin pack is a smaller size and would be the same amount if you ordered the larger single bottle for less the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy L

customer_reviews.title: I didn't like it much.
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this lotion, but I wasn't happy. It didn't work well enough for the high price. I will try another exfoliating lotion. The smell is also off-putting. It worked somewhat, but not enough for me to consider purchasing indefinitely.
customer_reviews.author: Robin M.

customer_reviews.title: This Stuff Works!
customer_reviews.text: My bumpy "chicken skin" has disappeared since I started using this product. My skin is smooth and healthy feeling. My only concern is that I must use this moisturizer daily or the condition returns. Thus, though it does what it purports to do, the "fix" is very temporary.
customer_reviews.author: Fran

customer_reviews.title: The bomb dot com
customer_reviews.text: I don’t normally do reviews but this is AWESOME. I’m 49 years old walking around here with adult Eczema looking a whole mess. When I say that this is doing wonders on my arms. This is a Godsend, still have a way to go but so much better. I use every morning and every night and I will be using it regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Geneva Chennault

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Lotion!
customer_reviews.text: This lotion is amazing. Makes your skin very soft and does not leave skin feeling sticky.
customer_reviews.author: Purchasing

customer_reviews.title: Good for KP
customer_reviews.text: Helps with “strawberry legs” this lotion goes on so smooth and is very moisturizing
customer_reviews.author: NurseT

customer_reviews.title: Came unsealed. It's a fake
customer_reviews.text: This is not the original product. It's clearly a fake. Do not risk your health. I wish I had read the reviews before I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonreviewer

customer_reviews.title: Opened bottle...
customer_reviews.text: I just received my package and opened it to test and see how the lotion feels, bu as soon as I opened the package and reached in to grab the bottle, my hand was already covered in lotion because the bottle was not sealed and it spilled out all inside the packaging. This of course was slightly upsetting because now there is a mess of lotion I had to clean, but also because at the end of the day, this is just some expensive lotion, and for all I know, it was switched out for some other knock off brand. I hope that’s not the case, but it’s still money wasted.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Slight brown color when it should be white
customer_reviews.text: Love this product and dr recommend for my skin. I do have one issue with this order which is the lotion is discolored-a slight brown color when it should be white. I hope my next order is not the same!
customer_reviews.author: Becky P.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY IT!!! FAKE!!!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY IT!. First of all, the bottle was open on the package, there was a mess inside the box. Then the color of the cream is not white, not even close, is more beige/yellow. And it smells like liquid glue. The. I saw the reviews and I noticed that it was not only me. I would say this is a FAKE!!!!! PRODUCT!!!! Do not buy it from Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Marco estrada

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful
customer_reviews.text: I’ve struggled with bumps on my arms and chest for years and this moisturizer + a new body wash has basically gotten rid of those bumps in just a few days
customer_reviews.author: Nadine

customer_reviews.title: Wasted Product
customer_reviews.text: I would have loved to use the lotion but when it arrived it was leaking all over the box and there really wasn't much left in the bottle. A waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Tomi

customer_reviews.title: This is not Amlactin
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased amlactin many times before, and it is a white lotion. What a received was a dark beige lotion that had a sour milk smell. Definitely not the real amlactin lotion.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J. Mendez

customer_reviews.title: Good lotion bad smell
customer_reviews.text: I love this lotion,I have very dry skin, it works great but it smells awful. I know it’s fragrance free but it smells terrible even for a fragrance free lotion. I still recommend the lotion but if your sensitive to smells skip this lotion.
customer_reviews.author: Liv

customer_reviews.title: Great for super dry skin
customer_reviews.text: Luckily the smell goes away after a few minutes. I had the scaliest legs before this stuff. My dermatologist recommended it. He knew what he was talking about. Amazing stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product it stings if you have cuts and feels sticky at first It is well worh the money just persevere helps really dry hard skin I use in my feet too
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Moffatt

customer_reviews.title: New horrible smell
customer_reviews.text: Second time purchasing. The first time I loved the lotion and how it made my skin feel. This time I can’t even put it on due to the horrible smell. I’m not sure what they changed, but I can’t use it. Definitely returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah L.

product_meta.title: AmLactin Daily Moisturizing Body Lotion, 7.9 Ounce (Pack of 1) Bottle, Paraben Free
product_meta.description: Size:7.9 Ounce (Pack of 1)AmLactin Daily Moisturizing Body Lotion is ideal for hydrating plus smoothing rough, dry skin on large areas of the body, such as the arms, legs, trunk, and back. This everyday moisturizer contains clinically proven 12% lactic acid that boosts the skin’s natural renewal process through gentle exfoliation. Recommended by dermatologists, it deeply moisturizes plus reveals softer, smoother skin with daily use. Help soften plus renew dry skin with AmLactin Daily Lotion.
feature_bullets: HYDRATE & SMOOTH: Our everyday moisturizer contains clinically proven 12% lactic acid to boost the skin’s natural renewal process through gentle exfoliation. It leaves skin feeling smooth & hydrated.
EVERYDAY AHA LOTION: AmLactin’s powerful Alpha Hydroxy Acid body lotion is gentle enough for daily use. AmLactin Daily gently exfoliates, deeply hydrates & helps the skin retain moisture.
DOCTOR RECOMMENDED: AmLactin is the #1 dermatologist-recommended moisturizer brand with AHA. Our therapeutic exfoliant lotions help lock in moisture & relieve dry, flaky, rough, or bumpy skin.
SMOOTH & SOFTEN: Our formulas combine a gentle AHA exfoliant with moisturizers to boost the skin’s natural renewal process through gentle exfoliation & deeply moisturize for younger-looking skin.

MORE THAN MOISTURIZERS: AmLactin’s therapeutic formulas go beyond traditional lotions & creams. We combine the power of Lactic Acid with emollients & humectants to help reveal smoother, healthier-looking skin with daily use.
